quoteText: Please be aware that the Agreement may change from time to time. We will post any changes on this page and, if the changes are significant, we will provide a more prominent notice. You are advised to check our Website regularly to view our most recent Agreement.
title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
